name: Be a Rock
description:
A unique 3rd-person exploration game set in a hauntingly beautiful open world. Your spirit is born in the shell of a rock. Immerse yourself in Be a Rock as you explore narrow canyons, vast deserts, and volcanic lands in order to uncover secrets of an ancient past. The game features exploration, collectables, puzzle solving, and a distinct emotional storytelling style. Along the way it will guide the player to eternal lessons inspired by Buddhist philosophy.
The game's mythology is based on the story of a real world lost civilization, the ruins of which the developer has personally visited. All of this greatly adds to the authenticity and depth of the game's lore. The fans of hits as Journey, Abzu, Lost Ember and The Spirit of the North will surely enjoy Be A Rock.

From the creators of the beloved and extremely fun game Pizza Syntwhave.

Please add Be a Rock to your wishlist!

Features:

- You are a rock.

- Beautiful open world to explore.


- A unique and emotional story.
- Photo-realistic environment.


- Hidden collectables to discover.
- Puzzle solving.


- Cute little rock buddy to keep you company.



- Accessibility: we value accessibility and strive to ensure that everyone can enjoy our game, regardless of any hearing impairments they may have. That's why we've made sure that every cut-scene in the game features subtitles, so that all players can fully immerse themselves in the experience.
